document_data.mainbody: The '''Cult of the Absolute''' was an organization that followed [[The Absolute]].
document_data.Description: Cultists of the Absolute took many forms, from mangy [[goblinoid]]s and ex-[[Lolth]]ite [[drow]],{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 1}}
document_data.Organization: The cult had several followers: those in high positions were known as [[True Soul]]s, though [[Disciple]]s were above them in the hierarchy. Many of the followers of the Absolute appeared to be stationed in [[Moonrise Towers]]. Those of the cult appeared to have been branded.
